name: Bloody Zombie
description:
Hello guy,

Your plane was crashed in an Island....and you don't know where are you exactly.

But you know the pricipal survive objectif....KILL RUN EXPLORE !!!!

But you are not alone........

Bloody Zombie is an horror game where you must Run , explore , found ammo , weapons , pills for survive... but a very big menace lives in this Island.

Bloody Zombie include :
  • Regular Updates
  • Many weapons
  • Many Zombie's type (girls scout , patient Zombie...)
  • System of Scoring

and more......

Update 17/01/2015:

-Add weapons MP5,Katana

-Add one new type zombie

Guy survive and GOOD LUCK in Bloody Zombie.
